job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: Required Skills:Expert in MySQL and one or more of the following: Oracle, Mongodb, Postgres, Oracle, MSSQL, Kafka, Hadoop, Hbase or HiveÂ Experience in Kafka for at least 1 year is Must.
